name: Dungeon Crusaders
description:
A challenging CoOp-Aventure for 1 to 2 player in local, 

Choose between the Holy shield and the faster strikes of the Crusader

or the mighty hit of the Kinght's claymore, 

Improve your reflexes to face and dodge the Formidable Enemies and defeat all the Bosses to reach the Castle's Throne and free the Kingdom!

(Demo Version)

This is demo of a bigger and ambitious project.

We invite you to download it to give us some feedback and make together a better and unique game.

In the future we'd like to add some feature like better Option settings, Controller Compatibility, Consumable Items, Skills and a bigger Character Selection.

- Graziano Brothers -
